reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: EU Southern Neighbourhood Advisory Programme for the Transport Sector

description.narrative: The overall objective of the Programme is to enhance economic development and employment creation in the Mediterranean Partner Countries by building up the transport sector capacity to prepare projects which are consistent with both national and EU objectives, and which can meet the due diligence requirements of potential international funders and as a result help connect the EU with its Southern neighbourhood, boost development and address key transport challenges.

title.narrative: Capacity of the Mediterranean Partner Countries (MPC) to formulate and design priority transport investment projects

description.narrative: Capacity of the Mediterranean Partner Countries (MPC) to formulate and design priority transport investment projects

title.narrative: Capacity of the Mediterranean Partner Countries (MPC) to formulate and design priority transport investment projects

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
